title: US 175 photo archive
text: The photo archive includes photos which have become obsolete due to construction or other changes. These photos show roadside views of the S.M. Wright Freeway (originally South Central Expressway), which was demolished and replaced with a boulevard between 2021 and 2023.

images.caption: This is near the north terminus of the freeway with Interstate 45 just ahead. This will become a ground-level, signalized intersection.
This is the northbound onramp at Metropolitan.
North of Metropolitan Street the frontage roads are shaded by a tree canopy. This is quite unusual for a frontage road.
